articles.description: Follow live text and 5 Live Final Score as Newcastle visit Borussia Dortmund and Man City host Young Boys in the Champions League.
articles.title: Champions League: Build-up to Dortmund v Newcastle before Man City v Young Boys

articles.description: Glenn Maxwell battles through injury to hit a sensational double century and guide Australia into the World Cup semi-finals with a win over Afghanistan.
articles.title: Sensational Maxwell leads Australia to semi-finals

articles.description: Australia's Glenn Maxwell reaches 100 off 76 balls in an attempt to revive their hopes of an unlikely victory over Afghanistan at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: Maxwell hits 'extraordinary' century as Australia fight back

articles.description: South Africa's Bongi Mbonambi accuses England of being "unprofessional" after alleging he directed a racial slur at Tom Curry.
articles.title: England 'unprofessional' over alleged racial slur

articles.description: Caster Semenya tells the BBC she is "not going to be ashamed" of being "different", and will "fight for what is right" amid her ongoing dispute with athletics authorities.
articles.title: Semenya 'not ashamed of being different'

articles.description: Tottenham's unbeaten Premier League run came to an end in chaotic fashion but the loss leaves Ange Postecoglou with a mountain of unexpected problems, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'One of the most mind-boggling Premier League games ever'

articles.description: Anthony Joshua is in the hot seat with Louis Theroux. Here are five things we learned about the heavyweight from his most candid interview yet.
articles.title: Rap battles & feeling the pressure - Louis Theroux interviews Joshua

articles.description: The Football Association says it will not charge Manchester United forward Alejandro Garnacho after he used gorilla emojis in a social media post.
articles.title: FA will not charge Garnacho over use of gorilla emojis

articles.description: Watch the moment Afghanistan's Mujeeb Ur Rahman drops a simple chance to dismiss Glenn Maxwell on 33 before the Australian went on to make an incredible 201 to secure victory for his country at the World Cup.
articles.title: Watch the key moment Mujeeb dropped simple chance to dismiss Maxwell

articles.description: Why a fish finger-loving Dutchman could deny England a place in the 2025 Champions Trophy.
articles.title: Dutch 'Bulldog' plots England upset in $500,000 match
